forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the last light of the day fades over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere carries a tranquil blend of clarity and a delicate chill. The forecast hints at a night where the clouds will hold their ground, creating a soft blanket against the crisp air, inviting an embrace of cozy layers. The expected low of around 45 degrees creates a setting where the allure of warmth beckons, perhaps a thick sweater or a light jacket paired with a comforting scarf will suffice to ward off the evening's cool kiss.

As dawn approaches, the morrow promises partly sunny skies, yet temperatures will drop, flirting with the low 50s by afternoon. While clarity reigns in the sightlines toward the Golden Gate and beyond, a reminder of the marine layer may linger in the corners of your view, recalling the iconic fog that sometimes drapes the city with an ethereal quality. It is a perfect backdrop for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a contemplative moment at a local café, savoring a warm beverage while watching the world drift by. In this calm, it feels like the city is resting, preparing for the day to unfold, the melodies of urban life muted under the dreamy haze of winter.
